com.querydsl.lucene4

Class LuceneSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.querydsl.lucene4.LuceneSerializer

  • public class LuceneSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
    Serializes Querydsl queries to Lucene queries.

    vema
